chart_description: This chart displays the rate of IPv6 ICMP errors per second.

dimension_descriptions.InCsumErrors: The number of inbound packets with checksum errors.
dimension_descriptions.InDestUnreachs: The number of inbound packets that could not reach their destination.
dimension_descriptions.InErrors: The number of inbound packets with errors other than checksum and destination unreachable.
dimension_descriptions.InParmProblems: The number of inbound packets with parameter problems.
dimension_descriptions.InPktTooBigs: The number of inbound packets that are too big to handle.
dimension_descriptions.InTimeExcds: The number of inbound packets with time exceeded errors.
dimension_descriptions.OutDestUnreachs: The number of outbound packets that could not reach their destination.
dimension_descriptions.OutErrors: The number of outbound packets with errors.
dimension_descriptions.OutParmProblems: The number of outbound packets with parameter problems.
dimension_descriptions.OutPktTooBigs: The number of outbound packets that are too big to handle.
dimension_descriptions.OutTimeExcds: The number of outbound packets with time exceeded errors.
